dct_title_s: Beschryvinge van den oorsprong der volkeren
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Deutsche mylen" and "Uren gaans".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, settlements, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of ships, a sea monster, angels.
Lower right margin: "Dese kaart wert gestelt voor het 3. cap. Genesis".
